data.name: Metro Exodus - Sam's Story
data.detailed_description:
Sam, a US marine at the Moscow embassy before the bombs were dropped, has long dreamed of returning to his homeland, and maybe finding his family alive. The prospect seemed impossible in the darkened tunnels of the Metro, but when the Spartans discovered that Moscow was not the only city left alive after the war, holding out hope didn’t feel so foolish anymore.

Sam makes his way away from the Aurora in search of a way back to the USA, arriving at the remains of Vladivostok’s tsunami ravaged harbours, ruined industrial buildings, and crumbling residential districts. To complete his journey, Sam will discover that he needs every tactic he has learned so far to survive, as his surroundings prove to be far trickier than expected.

Players will forge Sam's path through the sandbox survival landscape of Vladivostok, as they take a brand new journey across the wasteland of post-apocalyptic Russia.
data.about_the_game:
Sam, a US marine at the Moscow embassy before the bombs were dropped, has long dreamed of returning to his homeland, and maybe finding his family alive. The prospect seemed impossible in the darkened tunnels of the Metro, but when the Spartans discovered that Moscow was not the only city left alive after the war, holding out hope didn’t feel so foolish anymore.

Sam makes his way away from the Aurora in search of a way back to the USA, arriving at the remains of Vladivostok’s tsunami ravaged harbours, ruined industrial buildings, and crumbling residential districts. To complete his journey, Sam will discover that he needs every tactic he has learned so far to survive, as his surroundings prove to be far trickier than expected.

Players will forge Sam's path through the sandbox survival landscape of Vladivostok, as they take a brand new journey across the wasteland of post-apocalyptic Russia.
data.short_description: Sam, one of the soldiers of the Spartan Order, makes his way away from the Aurora in search of a way back to his home of the USA, arriving at the remains of Vladivostok’s tsunami ravaged harbours, ruined industrial buildings, and crumbling residential districts.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish, Russian*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 59 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD RX VEGA 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 59 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 - 7820
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Big SUR
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 - 7820
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 | Radeon R9 380 - 4GB VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 | RTX 2060 | AMD RX 5500 XT - 8 GB VRAM
